job.title: Software Engineer, Test
job.description: At Genesys weve built the best cloudbased Customer Experience CX service offerings which handles millions of interactions a day Our infrastructure involves hundreds of services deployed across 9 environments globally and we push out dozens of product builds per day using a topnotch CICD pipelinebrbrWe are looking for a talented Software Engineer Test to work with our Data Analytics team focusing on automated testing of big data processing and batch data actionsbrbrstronguResponsibilitiesbrustrongulliHelp develop new features for our platform service with quality built in liliTriage failed automated test executions and report defects when appropriate liliParticipating in code reviews direct collaboration and open discussion of ongoing work liliDevelop automation for new features and processes liliAssist development teams on testing best practices liliDetermine whether to deploy new code to production regions brliulstronguRequirementsbrustrongulliA Bachelor of Science degree in Computer Science or related degree or equivalent in work experience liliProficiency using Java liliPrevious experience using test frameworks like Selenium and TestNG liliUnderstanding of cloud computing ideally AWS brliulstronguNice To HavebrustrongulliAgileScrum experience liliBest practices for CICD liliProficiency using Python liliExperience testing RESTful APIs liliExperience with big data tools like Apache Spark liliExperience with Amazon Elastic MapReduce EMR liliExperience using version control systems like GitHub and BitBucket brliulstronguBenefitsbrustrongulliMedical Dental and Vision Insurance liliTelehealth coverage liliFlexible work schedules and work from home opportunities liliDevelopment and career growth opportunities liliOpen Time Off lili401k matching program liliAdoption Assistance liliInfertility treatments brliulSee more Genesys benefits information at httpsmygenesysbenefitscom
